nursery.key_activity: Seed treatment with Carbendazim 2g/kg. Maintain 2-3cm water in nursery beds.

transplanting.key_activity: Transplant 21-25 day old seedlings. Maintain 5cm standing water. Apply basal fertilizer.

tillering.key_activity: Top dress with Urea. Maintain 5cm water. Watch for stem borer and leaf folder.

flowering.key_activity: Critical water stage. No nitrogen application. Watch for blast disease.

grain_filling.key_activity: Reduce water gradually. Watch for brown plant hopper.

maturity.key_activity: Drain field 10-15 days before harvest. Harvest when 80% grains are golden.

sowing.key_activity: Sow seeds 5cm deep with 22.5cm row spacing. Apply seed treatment with Thiram.

crown_root_initiation.key_activity: First irrigation 21 days after sowing. Critical stage for stand establishment.

tillering.key_activity: Top dress with Urea. Second irrigation. Weed management critical.

jointing.key_activity: Third irrigation. Watch for rust and aphids.

flowering.key_activity: Critical water stage. Avoid water stress. Watch for Karnal bunt.

grain_filling.key_activity: Last irrigation. Hot winds can cause shriveling.

maturity.key_activity: Harvest when grain moisture is 12-14%. Avoid delays to prevent shattering.

sowing.key_activity: Sow after first monsoon rains. Seed treatment with Imidacloprid. 90x60cm spacing for Bt hybrids.

vegetative.key_activity: Thinning at 15 DAS. First inter-cultivation at 20 DAS. Watch for jassids and whitefly.

squaring.key_activity: Critical nutrient stage. Apply potash. Monitor for bollworm egg masses.

flowering.key_activity: Peak water demand. Apply growth regulator if excessive vegetative growth. Bollworm management critical.

boll_development.key_activity: Avoid water stress. Watch for pink bollworm. Last irrigation 20 days before harvest.

boll_opening.key_activity: Apply defoliant if needed. Pick cotton when 60% bolls are open. Avoid rain damage to open bolls.

planting.key_activity: Plant setts with 3 buds. Treat with Carbendazim. Row spacing 90-120cm. Light irrigation immediately.

germination.key_activity: Gap filling at 30 days. Light irrigation every 7-10 days. Apply Urea at 30 DAS.

tillering.key_activity: Earthing up at 90 and 120 DAS. Apply second dose of Nitrogen. De-trashing lower leaves.

grand_growth.key_activity: Maximum water demand. Irrigate every 7 days. Propping tall canes. Watch for top borer and internode borer.

maturity.key_activity: Reduce irrigation. Cool nights improve sugar recovery. Stop nitrogen. Harvest at peak Brix (18-20).

sowing.key_activity: Sow after onset of monsoon. Seed treatment with Thiram + Carbendazim. 30x10cm spacing.

vegetative.key_activity: Weeding at 15-20 DAS. Apply gypsum at 40 DAS for pod development.

flowering.key_activity: Critical moisture stage. Pegging begins. Avoid disturbance near plant base.

pegging_pod_formation.key_activity: Earthing up after pegging. Apply calcium if soil is deficient. Watch for leaf miner and tikka disease.

pod_filling.key_activity: Maintain soil moisture. Watch for collar rot and stem rot.

maturity.key_activity: Stop irrigation 15 days before harvest. Harvest when inner shell shows dark markings. Dry pods to 8% moisture.

sowing.key_activity: Broadcast or line sowing. Seed rate 10-12 kg/ha. Light irrigation after sowing.

vegetative.key_activity: Thinning at 20 DAS. First irrigation at 30 DAS. Weeding critical.

flowering.key_activity: Critical moisture stage. Watch for wilt (Fusarium). Avoid excess moisture.

seed_formation.key_activity: Light irrigation only if needed. Watch for Alternaria blight and aphids.

maturity.key_activity: Harvest when seeds turn brownish-grey. Dry in shade to retain volatile oils.

nursery.key_activity: Raise nursery in October. Seed treatment with Thiram. Light watering daily.

transplanting.key_activity: Transplant 6-8 week seedlings. 15x10cm spacing. Apply basal DAP and MOP.

vegetative.key_activity: Irrigate every 7-10 days. Top dress with Urea at 30 DAT. Weeding at 20 and 40 DAT.

bulb_formation.key_activity: Critical water stage. Longer days trigger bulbing. Apply potash. Watch for thrips.

bulb_development.key_activity: Reduce irrigation frequency. Watch for purple blotch and Stemphylium blight.

maturity.key_activity: Stop irrigation when 50% tops fall. Harvest, cure in shade for 3-5 days. Store in ventilated structures.

nursery.key_activity: Raise nursery in May-June. Seed treatment with Trichoderma. Light watering.

transplanting.key_activity: Transplant 5-6 week seedlings. 60x45cm spacing. Apply Neem cake in planting holes.

vegetative.key_activity: Top dress nitrogen at 30 and 60 DAT. Staking if needed. Watch for thrips and mites.

flowering.key_activity: Avoid water stress. High temperature causes flower drop. Watch for fruit borer.

fruiting.key_activity: Regular picking every 7-10 days. Apply potash spray for quality. Watch for leaf curl virus.

harvest.key_activity: Pick ripe fruits. Dry in sun for 8-10 days for dry chilli. Maintain moisture below 10%.

nursery.key_activity: Sow seeds in raised nursery beds. Seed treatment with Thiram.

transplanting.key_activity: Transplant 4-5 week seedlings. 75x60cm spacing. Apply basal fertilizer.

vegetative.key_activity: Staking and pruning. Top dress nitrogen. Watch for leaf miner.

flowering.key_activity: Avoid water stress. High temperature causes flower drop. Spray boron for fruit set.

fruiting.key_activity: Regular harvesting. Watch for fruit borer and late blight. Apply calcium to prevent blossom end rot.

maturity.key_activity: Harvest at breaker stage for distant markets. At red ripe for local sale.

sowing.key_activity: Sow with onset of monsoon. 60x20cm spacing. Seed treatment with Thiram.

vegetative.key_activity: Thinning at 10-15 DAS. Earthing up at 25-30 DAS. Top dress nitrogen.

tasseling.key_activity: Most critical water stage. Stress causes barren cobs. Watch for stem borer.

silking.key_activity: Ensure adequate moisture for pollination. Watch for fall armyworm.

grain_filling.key_activity: Maintain moisture. Hot dry winds can reduce grain weight.

maturity.key_activity: Harvest when husks turn brown and grain moisture is 20-25%. Dry to 12-14%.

sowing.key_activity: Sow with first monsoon rains. 45x15cm spacing. Seed treatment with metalaxyl for downy mildew.

vegetative.key_activity: Thinning at 10-15 DAS. Top dress nitrogen at 20-25 DAS. Inter-cultivation.

booting.key_activity: Critical moisture period. Ensure adequate moisture for earhead development.

flowering.key_activity: Watch for earhead worm and shoot fly. Spray if pest population exceeds threshold.

grain_filling.key_activity: Watch for grain smut. Bird scaring if needed.

maturity.key_activity: Harvest when earheads turn golden-brown. Thresh immediately. Dry to 12% moisture.

planting.key_activity: Plant seed tubers 5-7cm deep. 60x20cm spacing. Treat with Mancozeb.

emergence.key_activity: Light irrigation. Ensure uniform emergence. Gap filling with sprouted tubers.

vegetative.key_activity: Earthing up at 30 DAS. Top dress nitrogen. Weeding. Watch for aphids.

tuber_initiation.key_activity: Critical water stage. Cool soil promotes tuberization. Avoid water stress.

tuber_bulking.key_activity: Maximum water need. Watch for late blight. Spray Mancozeb preventively.

maturity.key_activity: Dehaulm 10-15 days before harvest. Harvest when skin does not peel on rubbing. Cure in shade.

sowing.key_activity: Sow in October-November for Rabi. Rhizobium seed inoculation. 30x10cm spacing.

vegetative.key_activity: Weeding at 20-25 DAS. One irrigation at 25-30 DAS if no rain.

flowering.key_activity: Critical moisture stage. Watch for pod borer (Helicoverpa). Apply NPV or Bt.

pod_filling.key_activity: Light irrigation if dry. Watch for wilt. Bird scaring for Pigeon pea.

maturity.key_activity: Harvest when 80% pods turn brown. Thresh after sun drying for 3-4 days.

sowing.key_activity: Sow in October. 45x15cm spacing for mustard. Seed treatment with Thiram.

vegetative.key_activity: Thinning at 15 DAS. First irrigation at 25-30 DAS. Weeding.

flowering.key_activity: Critical water stage. Watch for painted bug and aphids in mustard.

siliqua_development.key_activity: Light irrigation. Watch for alternaria blight. Avoid excess moisture.

maturity.key_activity: Harvest when 75% siliquae turn golden. Thresh after drying for 3-4 days.
